mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products(productsno, memberno, cateno, title, content, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate, price, dc, saleprice, point, salecnt, file2, file2saved, size2, file3, file3saved, size3, expdate, is_best, is_new, is_event, fileAd, fileAdsaved, sizeAd, item, maker, makedate, importyn, keep, counsel_tel, sizeinfo, origin, detail, pack, safe) VALUES(products_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{cateno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate, #{price}, #{dc}, #{saleprice}, #{point}, #{salecnt}, #{file2}, #{file2saved}, #{size2}, #{file3}, #{file3saved}, #{size3}, #{expdate}, #{is_best}, #{is_new}, #{is_event}, #{fileAd}, #{fileAdsaved}, #{sizeAd}, #{item}, #{maker}, #{makedate}, #{importyn}, #{keep}, #{counsel_tel}, #{sizeinfo}, #{origin}, #{detail}, #{pack}, #{safe})
mapper.select: SELECT productsno, memberno, cateno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, LOWER(file1) AS file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, file2, file2saved, size2, file3, file3saved, size3, expdate, fileAd, fileAdsaved, sizeAd, item, maker, makedate, importyn, keep, counsel_tel, sizeinfo, origin, detail, pack, safe FROM products ORDER BY productsno DESC
